articles.description: The last Soviet leader brought an end to the Cold War, but his reforms accelerated the break up of the USSR.
articles.content:

articles.description: Mikhail Gorbachev, who has died aged 91, was revered in West but criticised by many Russians for overseeing end of USSR.
